# The phar extension

Configure the `phar` extension.

This extension provides support for PHP archives (phar).

## PHP_EXT_PHAR

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_PHAR_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
